Key Match Events: Orlando Arcia hit a leadoff homer in the third inning
Orlando Arcia hit a two-out solo homer in the sixth inning
Sean Murphy hit a solo homer in the third inning
Pre-Game Insights: Matt Olson is finishing off his best month of the season
Orlando Arcia and Sean Murphy are showing signs of being ready to produce at a higher level
Reynaldo López is 2-0 with a 1.06 ERA in three starts against the Phillies this season
The Braves are 7-4 against the Phillies and clinched the 13-game season series with the win
The Braves remain five games behind the National League East-leading Phillies with 27 games left for each team
Post-Match Reflections: Olson had a run-scoring double in the seventh inning to extend his streak to seven games with at least one extra-base hit
Arcia thanked God for the way things have been going lately
Snitker acknowledged that the team is fighting hard and needs every win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando Arcia’s two homers gave him his second career two-homer game and first since 2019
Reynaldo López has the lowest ERA against the Phillies in three or more starts in a season by any pitcher since Jacob deGrom in 2018
Whit Merrifield and Ramón Laureano have hit far better as injury replacements with the Braves than they did with teams that released them earlier this season
